name: Lemongrass Sauce
keywords: lemongrass, lime juice, rice vinegar, low-fat, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 kaffir lime leaf, shredded fine (optional; sold in Asian markets)
2 tiny Thai red "bird" chilies, or other fresh red chilies, sliced (or to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the vinegar, sugar, water, fish sauce and lime juice in a small, nonreactive saucepan. Bring just to a boil; then, add the lemongrass and the lime leaf and simmer for 30 seconds.
Remove from heat, and place the saucepan in a bowl of ice and water to chill it until it is room temperature, about 10 minutes.
Stir in the cilantro, scallions and chilies to taste.
